definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
to be unsure about a matter/to be uncertain/to be unable to make sense of sth
in doubt/unsure of sth/unable to decide/indecisive

sentences.english: No fishing is allowed within twenty-mile limit.
sentences.chinese: 二十英里范围内不准钓鱼。

sentences.english: Never use the fork to overturn the pallet.
sentences.chinese: 不准用货叉挑翻货盘的方法取货。

sentences.english: It was necessary to forbid malicious criticism of the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 必须不准人恶意地批评农会。

sentences.english: Some confusion and problems arise from high-speed passenger ship management in prohibiting its night sailing.
sentences.chinese: 对高速客船不准夜航管理中出现的问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: In early days, women were forbidden to enter theatres, so all Peking Opera performers were men.
sentences.chinese: 早时妇女不准进剧场，所以京剧演员都是男的。

sentences.english: She told me not to be late any more.
sentences.chinese: 她警告我再也不准迟到的。

sentences.english: God forbid I assume LOL means “lots of love”.
sentences.chinese: 上帝不准我把LOL设想为“许多爱”的英文缩写。

sentences.english: You 'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你算不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 140 ohms , the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.chinese: 网路电阻超过140欧姆时，读数就完全不准了。

sentences.english: The little boy gazed longingly at the toy truck he wasn't allowed to buy.
sentences.chinese: 这小男孩很渴望地凝视著那个他不准买的玩具卡车。

sentences.english: I've just about had enough of your unpunctuality .
sentences.chinese: 你的不准时让我受够了。

sentences.english: He allowed no one else to see this process.
sentences.chinese: 他不准任何人旁观这道化妆过程。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嘱不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: “No parking” signs sprang up around the school campus.
sentences.chinese: 校园里出现一些“不准停车”的路牌。

sentences.english: Without it, nothing could ever be brought to a conclusion; everything would be in state of chaos.
sentences.chinese: 不准时将一事无成，事事都会陷入混乱不堪的境地。

sentences.english: You are not to scribble on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 不准你在墙上乱涂乱画。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
to agree on three laws (idiom)/three-point covenant/(fig.) preliminary agreement/basic rules
